item.title: Annual target for net additions
item.description: Consideration Backlog False Unknown Unknown The total housing requirement presented on an annual basis for the plan period as calculated by the Local Planning Authority Links Annual target for net additions consideration GitHub discussion .

item.title: Areas benefitting from flood defences
item.description: Consideration Archived False Unknown Unknown Areas that benefit from the presence of defences in a 1 percent fluvial / 0.5 percent tidal flood event.

item.title: Existing commitments
item.description: Consideration Backlog False Unknown Unknown The number of homes, within the Total Housing Requirement that are committed developments.

item.title: Housing delivery trajectory for local plan period
item.description: Consideration Backlog False Unknown Unknown A year by year breakdown of how it is intended for the LPA to deliver their housing numbers throughout the plan period.

item.title: Local housing need
item.description: Consideration Backlog False Unknown Unknown Housing need is an unconstrained assessment of the minimum number of homes needed in an area using the Standard Method.

item.title: Nutrient neutrality
item.description: Consideration Backlog False Unknown Unknown Nutrient Neutrality is the requirement for developments in affected parts of the country to mitigate the impacts of additional nutrient loads resulting from the development.

item.title: Total housing requirement
item.description: Consideration Backlog False Unknown Unknown This is the minimum number of homes that the plan seeks to provide during the plan period.

item.title: Windfall
item.description: Consideration Backlog False Unknown Unknown The number of homes within the Total Housing Requirement that the LPA will reply on windfall delivery for Links Windfall consideration GitHub discussion .

item.title: Areas of outstanding natural beauty
item.description: Consideration OnThePlatform False AdHoc Unknown Land protected by law to conserve and enhance its natural beauty Links Areas of outstanding natural beauty consideration GitHub discussion Legislation National dataset documentation page URL of national dataset Datasets area-of-outstanding-natural-beau...

item.title: Building preservation notices
item.description: Consideration OnThePlatform False Fortnightly Unknown A notice to stop un-listed buildings of special architectural or historic interest from being demolished or altered in a way that affects the character of the building Links Building preservation notices consideration GitHub discussion Legislatio...
